title: Sir David Attenborough - Up To Dec 2014 - Wildlife - Slimoo
description:
BBC - Sir David Attenborough - TVrip - Xvid - Slimoo
 
 

For about the last five years my TVrips have full or fixed endings.
No Squashed credits
No Announcer saying what is on next
Some people even repost my TVrips as DVDrips 


 

===================== NOTE =====================



 I use my upload to post new torrents,
 I do not re-seed any torrents 
 (Unless I know you via commenting)

 Once 5 people complete I stop seeding

=================================================

[b]This torrent has been created to be updated
Search for Attenborough - Slimoo
Download the one with the latest date



This will add any new files or replace upgraded video's

Almost all of these were capped by me and are all around the same qualiy
[color=blue]Except: Wildlife On One (See lower about the changes I made)
Thanks to the origional posters of Wildlife On One [/color]
But remember some of these are over 50 years old

=================================================

[b][color=blue]Wildlife On One [/color]
(Re-named Wildlife On Two when repeated on BBC2)

These are not my rips and some are low quality
There were a number of issues with these.


Formats, From Divx to MKV. 
Black Border - Sides
Black Border - Top and Bottom
Black Border - Top and Bottom and Sides
VHS - tracking line
Aspect Ratio - (Some very weird)
Volumes - Some too low, some too high
Un-edited - One had 8 mins of another show
Size - One 30 min ep was 700mb (Now 230mb, same quality)

All of the above I spent a little time fixing
Now they all kinda match

Typical File Info

.
.
[b]How to download NEW big torrents faster
.
A: The more you are uploading the faster you usually download
Put ALL your other torrents on PAUSE
.
B: Set your Torrent Client to download in FILE ORDER
You can be watching some Episodes while the others are downloading
.
C: [color=red]If you can not leave your PC on 24/7 then wait until there are a few seeders
If you switch off your PC then you take what you have downloaded with you
The seeders then need to upload them missing seeds AGAIN
When you return you might notice there is not much more available
That is because the seeders used their upload to replace the missing seeds you took away when you switched off your PC[/color][b]
